original_text: and the priest shall go out of the camp, and the priest shall look. Then, if the case of leprous disease is healed in the leprous person,
korean_text: 제사장은 진영에서 나가 진찰할지니 그 환자에게 있던 나병 환부가 나았으면

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall go out of the camp
Then, if the case of leprous disease is healed in the leprous person,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 만약 문둥병 환자의 병이 나으면,
